# PHProjectType

**Structure**

The type descriptor of a project extension.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PHProjectType
```

## Initializing a Project Type

- **init(_:)**: Initializes a project type from a string.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a project type from its raw string value.

## Defining a Project Type

- **undefined**: An undefined project type.

## Determining Project Type

- **projectType**: The project type that the user selected from the project extension options.
- **creationSource**: The source from which the project was created.
- **sections**: An array of project sections, each containing one or more section content objects.
- **PHProjectTypeDescription**: An extensible enumerator for [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHProjectType] that’s presented to users in the project picker.
- **PHProjectTypeDescriptionDataSource**: A protocol that you use to provide the project with type description data.
- **PHProjectTypeDescriptionInvalidator**: A protocol that you use to tell the project when and how to invalidate type and footer text.
- **PHProjectInfo.CreationSource**: Defines the source of a project extension.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
